definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Remove the old faucet and scrape any old putty or caulk from the basin.
sentences.chinese: 拆调旧水龙头，并刮去洗槽旧的腻子或填充物。

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸钡制造醇酸腻子。

sentences.english: I also use a resistive putty for tabletop exercises to do the same things with my patients.
sentences.chinese: 我也用电阻腻子桌面演习做同样的事，与我的病人。

sentences.english: In addition , polyacrylonitrile fiber reinforced putties show better application performances .
sentences.chinese: 此外，纤维增强腻子展现出了更好的施工性能。

sentences.english: We have also found that sanding sealers have very poor adhesion properties.
sentences.chinese: 我们还发现打磨腻子的附着性比较差。

sentences.english: Board grow an edge to answer along fore-and- aft laid, nailhole place uses gesso dirt child smooth.
sentences.chinese: 板的长边应沿纵向铺设，钉眼处用石膏腻子抹平。

sentences.english: This is the first coat of primer using no red putty at all.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一层的底漆使用也没有红腻子在所有。

sentences.english: Since there is less wear on epoxy putty layer, it can promote the flatness of epoxy ground.
sentences.chinese: 同时对环氧腻子层的磨损小，提高环氧地面的平整度。

sentences.english: Still have to clean up the drains a bit more and a few more putty bits and light sanding to do.
sentences.chinese: 仍然要清理沟渠多一点和多几个腻子位和轻砂做的。

sentences.english: Sanding sealers were developed primarily for industrial use as a sealing base for chemical based lacquers.
sentences.chinese: 打磨腻子是设计用来给工业用化学清漆做底层的。

sentences.english: After the putty dried I wet sanded again and this was what I ended up with.
sentences.chinese: 后腻子的干燥i湿砂纸再次，这是我结束了。

sentences.english: A bit of spot putty to smooth things over and then I sanded it smooth.
sentences.chinese: 有点现货的腻子，以打圆场，然后我用砂纸它顺利。

sentences.english: The putty powder used by this product has lower cost.
sentences.chinese: 配制成的腻子粉的成本相对降低。

sentences.english: Then apply a rope of plumber’s putty to the underside of the drain flange and press it into the drain hole.
sentences.chinese: 在排水管法兰下方填上一卷腻子并把法兰压入排水孔。

sentences.english: If there is a small piece of damaged, can use gesso be bored with child after repair blow with a knife flat.
sentences.chinese: 如果有小块破损，可用石膏腻子修补后用小刀刮平。

definition: to point a brick wall/to grout a tiled surface
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
